analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Ajjhattaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhā nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Bahiddhā
analyzed: ajjhattam hetum dhammam paṭicca na bahiddhā na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā bahiddhā

original: hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Ajjhattaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhā nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ajjhattam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na bahiddhā na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Bahiddhā nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhatto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: bahiddhā na hetum dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
